original_title: Five takeaways from a week of Trump’s Ukraine diplomacy — RT World News
article_summary: Hungary threatens to cut off power supply to Ukraine following an attack on a pipeline carrying Russian oil, with Foreign Minister Peter Szijjarto accusing Kiev of undermining Hungary's energy security. Tensions between the two countries have been escalating due to Hungary's refusal to provide military aid to Ukraine and its criticism of EU sanctions against Russia.</s>
